content: you can find the free pattern in my website https //littleloveeveryday com/amigurumi-cattus-pattern/ please note that this is a digital item pdf file and not the finished toy cattus amigurumi pattern by a little love everyday this pdf pattern is written in us crochet terms and is available in english skill level easy/intermediate the pattern requires basic crochet knowledge you should be familiar with - magic_ring - single_crochet - double_crochet - bobble stitch - increase - invisible decrease - invisible fasten_off - slip_stitch materials you will need medium worsted weight yarn in green white light green yellow and pink 3 5 mm crochet hook 8 mm safety eyes polyester fiberfill for stuffing black embroidery thread and needle tapestry needle stitch marker scissors >> this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to share publish resell distribute or rewrite this pattern in any way >> you may sell items made from this pattern but kindly credit me as the designer and include a link to this pattern hope you will enjoy crocheting this cute cattus patternmuch as i did
